com.percussion.pso.validation
Class PSOAbstractItemValidationExit

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.pso.validation.PSOItemXMLSupport
      com.percussion.pso.validation.PSOAbstractItemValidationExit
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.percussion.extension.IPSExtension, com.percussion.extension.IPSItemValidator, com.percussion.extension.IPSResultDocumentProcessor
Direct Known Subclasses:
PSORequiredFieldsItemValidation
public abstract class PSOAbstractItemValidationExit
extends PSOItemXMLSupport
implements com.percussion.extension.IPSItemValidator, com.percussion.extension.IPSResultDocumentProcessor

Base class for Item Validation exits. Provides generic routines for handling of error documents, fields and lookup of destination workflow states.

Author:
DavidBenua

hasErrors

protected boolean hasErrors(org.w3c.dom.Document errorDoc)

matchDestinationState

protected boolean matchDestinationState(java.lang.String contentid,
                                        java.lang.String transitionid,
                                        java.lang.String allowedStates)
                                 throws com.percussion.error.PSException
Matches the current item workflow state and transition ids with a comma delimited list of workflow state names. This method will return true if the destination state matches one of the listed states. If the state list is blank or contains a single "*" it is assumed to match all states.

Parameters:
contentid - the content id of the item
transitionid - the transition id
allowedStates - the list of destination state names that match.
Returns:
true when a match occurs,false otherwise.
Throws:
com.percussion.error.PSException
